thread.title: Four-star DT commits to Alabama from former teammate's gravesite
thread.title_full: Four-star DT commits to Alabama from former teammate's gravesite

author: Joe Rodgers (joseph.rodgers@peformgroup.com)
title: Four-star DT commits to Alabama from former teammate's gravesite
text:
January 31, 2017 7:28pm   7:28pm EST American Football, News, English, NCAA Division I FBS, Alabama Mathis honored his late friend and fellow Louisiana football player Tyrell Cameron by making his college announcement at a cemetery. Alabama helmet (Getty Images) 
Updated at 7:28 p.m. ET 
Updated at 7:28 p.m. ET 
Phidarian Mathis, a defensive tackle from Monroe, La., became the 15th four-star player to join Alabamaâ€™s top-ranked 2017 recruiting class on Tuesday, and he did so in the most venerating way possible. 
Mathis honored his late friend and fellow Louisiana high school football player Tyrell Cameron by making his college announcement at a cemetery near Cameron's grave site.
